name: Triple 7s
description: Slightly gain energy with 777m remaining.

name: Highlander
description: Slightly improve running on an uphill.

name: Uma Stan
description: Slightly increase velocity when close to many runners.

name: Groundwork
description: Slightly increase acceleration after activating many skills early-race.

name: Tail Held High
description: Slightly increase velocity after activating many skills mid-race.

name: Shake It Out
description: Slightly recover endurance after activating many skills late-race.

name: Sympathy
description: Moderately increase performance when many runners share a sympathetic heart.

name: Lone Wolf
description: Moderately increase performance when no other runners have the heart of a lone wolf.

name: Slipstream
description: Slightly decrease wind resistance when following directly behind another runner.

name: Playtime's Over!
description: Slightly increase velocity when followed by another runner directly behind for a long time.

name: Trending in the Charts!
description: Increase velocity when engaged in a challenge mid-race. (Dirt)

name: Top Pick
description: Slightly increase velocity when engaged in a challenge mid-race. (Dirt)

name: Burning Spirit SPD
description: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing velocity in proportion to the total Speed of racing team members mid-race.

name: Ignited Spirit SPD
description: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly increasing velocity in proportion to the total Speed of racing team members mid-race.

name: Burning Spirit STA
description: Burn bright with team spirit, recovering endurance in proportion to the total Stamina of racing team members mid-race.

name: Ignited Spirit STA
description: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly recovering endurance in proportion to the total Stamina of racing team members mid-race.

name: Burning Spirit PWR
description: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing acceleration in proportion to the total Power of racing team members late-race.

name: Ignited Spirit PWR
description: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly increasing acceleration in proportion to the total Power of racing team members late-race.

name: Burning Spirit GUTS
description: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing vigor in proportion to the total Guts of racing team members late-race.

name: Ignited Spirit GUTS
description: Burn bright with team spirit, very slightly increasing vigor in proportion to the total Guts of racing team members late-race.

name: Burning Spirit WIT
description: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing strategic navigation in proportion to the total Wit of racing team members early-race.

name: Ignited Spirit WIT
description: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly increasing strategic navigation in proportion to the total Wit of racing team members early-race.

name: Unquenched Thirst
description: Moderately increase performance with the desire to race.

name: Unchanging
description: Greatly increase performance with the same ambition of days past.

name: Shooting Star
description: Slightly increase velocity when passing another runner toward the front late-race.

name: The View from the Lead Is Mine!
description: Slightly increase velocity when in the lead by a fair margin on the final straight.

name: Sky-High Teio Step
description: Moderately increase velocity when closing the gap to runners ahead on the final straight.

name: Red Shift/LP1211-M
description: Slightly increase acceleration when positioned toward the front on the final corner or later.

name: Lights of Vaudeville
description: Moderately increase velocity when just breaking out of the pack toward the front on the final straight.

name: Triumphant Pulse
description: Moderately increase ability to break out of the pack when positioned toward the front with 200m remaining.

name: Anchors Aweigh!
description: Very slightly increase velocity steadily with a long spurt starting halfway through the race.

name: Cut and Drive!
description: Slightly increase velocity when positioned toward the front with 200m or less remaining.

name: Resplendent Red Ace
description: Very slightly swell with the determination to stay number one in the second half of the race.

name: Shooting for Victory!
description: Slightly increase acceleration when well-positioned on the final corner.

name: Where There's a Will, There's a Way
description: Slightly increase velocity when passing another runner toward the back on the final straight.

name: You and Me! One-on-One!
description: Slightly increase velocity when passing another runner on the outside toward the back on the final straight.

name: The Duty of Dignity Calls
description: Slightly increase velocity when positioned toward the front on the final corner.

name: Victoria por plancha ☆
description: Very slightly hang on to the advantage when positioned toward the front with energy to spare on the final straight.

name: This Dance Is for Vittoria!
description: Slightly increase velocity when engaged in a challenge toward the front on the final corner.

name: Shadow Break
description: Slightly increase velocity when passing another runner on the outside on the final corner or later.

name: Behold Thine Emperor's Divine Might
description: Moderately increase velocity on the final straight after passing another runner 3 times late-race.

name: Blazing Pride
description: Slightly increase velocity when passing another runner toward the back on the final corner.

name: Angling and Scheming
description: Slightly increase acceleration when in the lead on a corner late-race.

name: ∴win Q.E.D.
description: Slightly increase velocity when passing another runner toward the front on the final corner.

name: Flashy☆Landing
description: Very slightly increase ability to break out of the pack on the straight after engaging in a challenge toward the front on the final corner.

name: G00 1st. F∞;
description: Slightly increase velocity when positioned toward the front after making it to the final straight without faltering.

name: Let's Pump Some Iron!
description: Slightly increase acceleration in an attempt to move up on a corner late-race.

name: Blue Rose Closer
description: Slightly increase velocity when breaking out of the pack on the final straight.

name: U=ma2
description: Slightly recover endurance when conserving energy on a corner in the second half of the race.

name: Our Ticket to Win!
description: Slightly increase velocity when refusing to back down from a challenge on the final straight.

name: Schwarzes Schwert
description: Slightly increase velocity in a dash for the lead after running calmly and according to plan up until the final straight.

name: #LookatCurren
description: Very slightly begin to advance when passing another runner while well-positioned around halfway through the race.

name: KEEP IT REAL.
description: Very slightly increase acceleration steadily when starting to make a move from midpack in the second half of the race.

name: Genius x Bakushin = Victory
description: Slightly increase velocity when engaged in a challenge toward the front in the second half of the race.

name: Pure Heart
description: Slightly recover endurance when well-positioned mid-race.

name: SPARKLY☆STARDOM
description: Become very slightly empowered against ceding the spotlight when about to lose the lead on a straight mid-race.

name: Nemesis
description: Slightly increase velocity when moving up from a position toward the back of the pack on the final corner.

name: Super-Duper Climax
description: Slightly recover endurance with a glance at nearby runners when positioned toward the back on the final corner.

name: I See Victory in My Future!
description: Slightly clear a path forward depending on divination results when the way ahead is jammed late-race.

name: I Never Goof Up!
description: Very slightly aim for the front when passing another runner from midpack or further back on a corner late-race.

name: Just a Little Farther!
description: Slightly increase velocity when positioned 3rd and about to lose late-race.

name: Prideful King
description: Moderately increase velocity in a true display of skill with 200m remaining after racing calmly.

name: Dazzl'n ♪ Diver
description: Slightly recover endurance after activating 2 skills mid-race.

name: Certain Victory
description: Slightly increase velocity when on the heels of another runner toward the front on the final straight.

name: A Kiss for Courage
description: Slightly increase velocity when positioned toward the front in the second half of the race after recovering endurance with a skill.

name: Superior Heal
description: Slightly recover endurance when dropping down toward the back mid-race.

name: Legacy of the Strong
description: Slightly increase velocity when pressured by another runner and running out of energy toward the front on the final corner or later.

name: Condor's Fury
description: Slightly increase acceleration when aiming for the front from midpack on the final corner.

name: Eternal Moments
description: Slightly increase velocity when starting to make a move from a position toward the front mid-race.

name: Flowery☆Maneuver
description: Slightly increase velocity when passing another runner toward the front on the final corner. If passing toward the back, slightly increase acceleration instead.

name: Bountiful Harvest
description: Slightly increase velocity with a surge of fortune when pressured by another runner toward the back in the second half of the race.
